file_content.text: Hello, Sith. You're always welcome among the Mandalorians.
Doing fine here. Still cleaning up from your massacre.
Thanks, but I don't need your services any more.
The Sand People will remember what you did to Bloodgouge. So will I.
You reek of viscera and rot, the scent of battle. Never smelled anything sweeter.
That's the stench of Bloodgouge. You've killed the brute!
With his head, you'll become a Mandalorian legend. You must have fought hard for this prize.
He was dead the moment you told me his name.
His fate was decided long ago.
Took some twisting, but the head finally popped off.
The head? Nah, it was simple.
The Sand People are running scared, bleeding out. Good job tearing them apart!
There's something satisfying about slaying an entire tribe.
I enjoyed the experience.
Ha! I like this one.
What's next?
They weren't a challenge.
We'll track down the surviving Sand People, stomp them out. This has been a good day.
Any Mandalorian would be happy to fight by your side. May you spill much blood in your battles ahead!
The fight won't wait for you. Kill the Sand People, bring us Bloodgouge's head if you slay him!
You all are just in time! The fight's heating up, and there's fun to be had for all!
Oh look, a genuine Sith! Must be here to join in the fun! There's blood enough for all!
Hiya Imp, you here for the fun? Been blood and glory all day!
What have we here? Soldier o' fortune? It's your lucky day--there's blood enough for all!
Hello there, here to join in the fray? There's blood enough for all!
Don't mind him. Gezda was injured in the first wave of attacks. He's been hyped up on adrenals ever since.
Only lost a few toes, most of the feeling in my head. Nothing serious.
We've been sending squads out all day. A mere dozen Mandalorians dead, meanwhile the bodies of our enemies pile up!
Care to try your luck? Test yourself against the most fearsome Sand People on this rock?
I might be up for a good trouncing.
Sounds tempting.
Don't know a sane person who isn't!
Wait. What's going on here?
I never rely on chance.
Just what I say! Takes an attitude like that to win battles!
This vicious Sand People tribe is rallying for a major assault--to destroy our village and anything else they come across.
But instead, we'll destroy their tribe, stop the spread of Bloodgouge's influence and revel in glory!
Who's Bloodgouge?
Bloodgouge?
Nothing like a party to unwind after a slaughter.
That's my kind of revelry.
It's a good tradition, but first we've gotta destroy the Sand People. Maybe even kill Bloodgouge, too.
How does this concern me?
You won't find a better slaughter on Tatooine--might even get a shot at Bloodgouge.
He's defeated more Mandalorians than anyone else on the planet. But today his troops will be smashed, his power broken.
What do you say? Up for butchering some Sand People, throwing yourself against the forces of their most legendary leader?
A good evisceration's just what the Sand People need.
I do like to "butcher".
I'll rip apart the Sand People and scatter their remains.
I'll destroy them completely.
Make it messy. They don't deserve anything less.
I'll execute the Sand People before they know I'm there.
They won't see me coming.
Wish I could be there to watch.
Want any keepsakes? Gaffi sticks, maybe some skull fragments?
Should I bring back trophies?
We don't need any trinkets from the Sand People.
I'll do it, just fill me in.
Kill as many of them as you can, and if you can take out some leaders before you fall, more glory to you!
Count me out. [Refuse quest]
No problem. More victims for the rest of us!
Farewell. There'll be plenty more spoiling for a fight.
The battle's on. No time for talk.
